text: This is a list of Indian chefs, who are known for their work in the culinary arts and preparing various types of Indian dishes and recipes. ==Indian chefs== Chef alt=Chef Vikas Khanna with Riyo Mori, Miss Universe 2007 Nilesh Limaye in 2010 Manju Malhi Some of the notable Indian chefs include: * Aarti Sequeira (1978–Present) * Anjum Anand (1971–Present) * Surjan Singh Jolly * Farrokh Khambata * Floyd Cardoz (1960–2020) * Gaggan Anand * Garima Arora * Harpal Sokhi * Hemant Bhagwani * Jacob Sahaya Kumar Aruni (1972-2012) * Kumar Mahadevan (1960–Present) * Kunal Kapur * M.S. Krishna Iyer * Madhur Jaffrey (1933–Present) * Manav Paul (1975-Present) * Maneet Chauhan (1976–Present) * Manish Mehrotra (1974–Present) * Manju Malhi * Manjunath Mural (1973–Present) * Mehboob Alam Khan * Narayana Reddy * Narayanan Krishnan (1981–Present) * Nelson Wang (1950–Present) * Nikita Gandhi (2012–Present) *Nilesh Limaye (1972–Present) *Nita Mehta *Pablo Miranda (Goa) (1990–Present) *Rajesh Mazumder *Raji Jallepalli (1949–2002) *Ranveer Brar (1978–Present) *Ritu Dalmia (1973–Present) *Romy Gill (1972–Present ) *Sanjay Thumma (1970–Present) *Sanjeev Kapoor (1964–Present) *Saransh Goila (1987–Present) *Shazia Khan *Shipra Khanna (1981–Present) *Shonali Sabherwal *Suvir Saran (1972–Present) *Tarla Dalal (1936- 2013) *Vikas Khanna (1971–Present) *Vikram Sunderam *Vishwesh Bhatt *Vivek Singh (1971–Present) ==See also== * List of chefs ==References== == External links == Category:Indian chefs Category:Chefs of Indian cuisine Category:Lists of chefs Chefs
title: List of Indian chefs
